page-events-meta-description: Discover the top crypto and blockchain conferences shaping {year}. Explore major Ethereum events, Web3 meetups, and global gatherings.
page-events-hero-subtitle: Ethereum comes alive through the people. From small Web3 meetups and community gatherings to major conferences, hackathons, and permanent community hubs that anchor local ecosystems around the world.
page-events-section-hubs-subtitle: You can join regular co-working sessions and community events in these permanent spaces, perfect for inspired work, learning, connecting, and building.
page-events-hub-description-london: A dedicated floor for Ethereum builders, researchers, creators, students, and explorers at Encode Club.
page-events-hub-description-berlin: The Ethereum Foundation office opens its doors every Wednesday for builders, researchers, creators, students, and explorers to co-work, connect, and collaborate.
page-events-hub-description-dubai: An inspiring space hosted at Hadron Founders Club for founders, builders, researchers, and explorers to co-work, connect, collaborate, and learn.
page-events-hub-description-lagos: A vibrant community space at Web3Bridge in Lagos for builders, founders, researchers, and creatives to co-work, collaborate, and grow together.
page-events-hub-cta-default: Join for everyday co-working and regular events.
page-events-hub-cta-berlin: Join for Co-working Wednesdays and regular events.
page-events-section-find-events-subtitle: Search for upcoming conferences, hackathons, and community gatherings from around the world in the Ethereum ecosystem.
page-events-search-no-results: No events found matching your search
page-events-section-local-meetups-subtit: Events held by groups of Ethereum enthusiastsâ€”a chance for people interested in Ethereum to get together, talk about Ethereum, and learn about recent developments.
page-events-section-upcoming-conferences: Explore the most inspiring conferences across the Ethereum community, where builders, researchers, and dreamers come together to learn, connect, and shape the future.
page-events-section-organizers-subtitle: Whether you are planning your first event or have been hosting a meetup, workshop, hackathon, or community gathering, there are many useful resources and teams that can provide guidance, support, and additional resources so your event is successful and can make the most impact.
page-events-section-organizers-planning-: Here is a comprehensive event guide written with the support of the community, for the community.
page-events-section-support-subtitle: Below, you will find teams that can provide you with support, guidance, and assistance whether you're planning your first event, continuing, developing, or improving an ongoing event, series of community gatherings, or other initiatives.
page-events-support-ethereum-everywhere-: The Ethereum Everywhere team is an ecosystem amplification team within the Ethereum Foundation, supporting local communities and events in diverse ways to help them become successful and sustainable in the long-term.
Friendly advisory on planning and running successful events and communities that welcome new builders and users, help them onboard, and keep existing communities connected and engaged.
Providing templates, best practices, updates, and opportunity boards to help organizers create consistent and engaging experiences.
Support with finding regional partners, contributors, and speakers - plus visibility through community and social media channels.
page-events-support-geode-labs-descripti: Geode Labs is a global Ethereum ecosystem development organization and product studio born from the Ethereum Foundation.
page-events-support-geode-labs-grants-de: Ecosystem grants strengthening Ethereum decentralization with a focus at the grassroots level.
page-events-support-geode-labs-local-des: A newsletter collaborating with local community leaders to tell Ethereum's geo-stories.
page-events-support-geode-labs-ethstars-: An Ethereum community hub where builders learn, connect, and earn.
page-events-no-upcoming: No upcoming events at this time
page-events-conferences-hero-subtitle: Discover the top crypto and blockchain conferences shaping {year}. Explore major Ethereum events, Web3 meetups, and global gatherings driving the next wave of decentralized innovation.
page-events-meetups-hero-subtitle: Ethereum meetups are where real community forms. From casual builder hangouts and coworking days to workshops and local ecosystem gatherings. Explore upcoming meetups around the world and connect with people building on Ethereum in your city.
page-events-meetups-events-subtitle: Search upcoming hackathons, community gatherings, and conferences around the Ethereum ecosystem.
page-events-cta-body: This is a non-exhaustive list maintained by our community. Know of an upcoming Ethereum event to add to this list?
